hamper.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make it difficult for someone to do something
hamper.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She tried to run, but was hampered by her heavy suitcase.
An attempt to rescue the men has been hampered by bad weather.
hamper.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a basket with a lid, which is used for carrying food or sending it to someone as a present
hamper.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: They sent us a lovely Christmas hamper.
hamper.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a large basket that you put dirty clothes in until they can be washed
